00191   {
00192     return;
00193   }

00476

00480 
00481   //confirm closing
00482   if( configGeneral->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_CONFIRM_CLOSE, DEFAULT_CONFIRM_CLOSE ) ) {
00483 
00484     if( askCloseConfirmation() == true )
00485       return true;

00529 void KShowmail::slotRefreshReady()
00530 {
00531   //set state to idle
00532   state = idle;
00533 
00534   //set normal cursor
00535   while( QApplication::overrideCursor() )
00536     QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00537 
00538   //show status message
00539   showStatusMessage( i18nc( "@info:status application is idle", "Ready" ) );
00540 
00541   //refresh view
00542   view->refreshViews( mailSelectModel );
00543 
00544   //refresh filter status bar
00545   refreshFilterStatusBar();
00546 
00547   //show the number of mails
00548   trayIcon->drawNumber( accounts->getNumberMails(), accounts->getNumberNewMails() != 0 ? Qt::red : Qt::black );
00549 
00550   //show refresh time
00551   QString sTime = QTime::currentTime().toString ();
00552   statusBar()->changeItem( i18nc( "@info:status time of the last refresh", "Last Refresh: %1", sTime ), STATUSBAR_FIELD_LAST_REFRESH );
00553 
00554   //handle new mails actions
00555   if( accounts->getNumberNewMails() > 0 ) {
00556 
00557     handleNewMails();
00558 
00559   } else {
00560 
00561     handleNoNewMails();
00562   }
00563 
00564   //store mail headers
00565   KConfigGroup* confGeneral = new KConfigGroup( KGlobal::config(), CONFIG_GROUP_GENERAL );
00566 
00567   if( confGeneral->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_STORE_HEADERS, DEFAULT_STORE_HEADERS ) ) {
00568     accounts->saveMails();
00569   }
00570 
00571 
00572   //start the refresh timer
00573   startAutomaticRefresh();
00574 
00575 }

00638 void KShowmail::startAutomaticRefresh( bool initiate ) {
00639 
00640   //just start if auto refresh is desired
00641   if( configGeneral->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_AUTO_REFRESH, DEFAULT_AUTO_REFRESH ) ) {
00642 
00643     //get refresh time
00644     if( initiate ) {
00645 
00646       timeToRefresh = configGeneral->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_INITIAL_TIME, DEFAULT_INITIAL_TIME );
00647 
00648     } else {
00649 
00650       timeToRefresh = configGeneral->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_INTERVAL_TIME, DEFAULT_INTERVAL_TIME ) * 60;
00651     }
00652 
00653     //start the timer
00654     refreshTimer->start( 1000 );
00655 
00656   } else {
00657 
00658     refreshTimer->stop();
00659   }
00660 
00661

00717

00725       mediaObject->setCurrentSource( Phonon::MediaSource( file ) );
00726       mediaObject->play();
00727 
00728     }
00729 
00730   }
00731 
00732   if( conf->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_NEW_MAIL_ALERTWINDOW, DEFAULT_ACTION_NEW_MAIL_ALERTWINDOW) ) {
00733 
00734       newMailDlg->show();
00735   }
00736 
00737   if( conf->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_NEW_MAIL_MAINWINDOW, DEFAULT_ACTION_NEW_MAIL_MAINWINDOW ) ) {
00738 
00739       slotShowMainWindow();
00740   }
00741 
00742   if( conf->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_NEW_MAIL_BEEP, DEFAULT_ACTION_NEW_MAIL_BEEP ) ) {
00743 
00744       kapp->beep();
00745   }
00746 
00747   if( conf->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_NEW_MAIL_COMMAND, DEFAULT_ACTION_NEW_MAIL_COMMAND ) ) {
00748 
00749     //get command
00750     QString command = conf->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_NEW_MAIL_COMMANDPATH, "" );
00751 
00752     //execute it
00753     if( command.length() > 0 ) {
00754 
00755       QStringList parts = command.split( ' ', QString::SkipEmptyParts );
00756 
00757       if( !command.isEmpty() )
00758       {
00759         KProcess::execute( parts );
00760       }
00761 
00762     }
00763 
00764   }
00765 
00766   delete conf;
00767
